sentence.Network_cn: 你如此滥用自己的才能,使我深感不安.

entry.tran: 使用不当;误用;滥用；盗用
entry.def: The misuse of something is incorrect, careless, or dishonest use of it.

entry.tran: 对…使用不当;误用;滥用;盗用
entry.def: If someone misuses something, they use it incorrectly, carelessly, or dishonestly.

example.ex: You are protected instantly if a thief misuses your credit card...
example.tran: 如果小偷盗用你的信用卡，你的卡会立即受到保护。

example.ex: She misused her position in the appointment of 26,000 party supporters to government jobs.
example.tran: 她滥用职权，任命了26,000名党羽在政府部门工作。

means.word_mean: 1. apply to a wrong thing or person; apply badly or incorrectly;

sentences.sentence: "The words are misapplied in this context"
"You are misapplying the name of this religious group"

means.word_mean: 2. change the inherent purpose or function of something;

sentences.sentence: "The director of the factory misused the funds intended for the health care of his workers"

stems_affixes.value_cn: 无用的, 无效的, 无益的, 无价值的
stems_affixes.word_buile: use用+less无→adj.无用的, 无效的, 无益的, 无价值的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 有用的, 有益的, 有帮手的
stems_affixes.word_buile: use用+ful表形容词→adj.有用的, 有益的, 有帮手的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 使用, 利用, 耗费
stems_affixes.word_buile: use用→n.&v.使用, 利用, 耗费

stems_affixes.value_cn: 打消[某人]的错误念头,纠正
stems_affixes.word_buile: dis去掉+abuse[n.&v.滥用]→去掉滥用→纠正错误

means.word_mean: 使用…不当;把…派作不正当的用途

sentences.en: He was sacked for computer misuse.
sentences.cn: 他因滥用计算机而被解雇了。

sentences.en: He had grossly misused his power.

sentences.cn: 他可耻地虐待自己的狗。

sentences.en: He has taken a public stand on the issue of misuse of hospital funds.
sentences.cn: 在滥用医院资金问题上，他采取公开的反对态度。
